title: Duke Nukem: Manhattan Project
notes:
Game runs flawless
optional tweaks i did was changing the FoV and the resolution but it is not necessary
1, open /duke/base/config.cfg 
2, add this line in the config: uset g_cam_fov "90"
3, and change: uset r_mode "640x480x32" 
4, save and make it read-only
